prompt: If a train travels 60 mph for 2.5 hours, how far does it go? Show your work.
Write a brief, polite email to inform a customer that their order will be delayed by 2 days.
gold_answer:
Subject: Update on Your Order

Dear Customer,

We wanted to inform you that your recent order will be delayed by 2 days due to unexpected shipping delays. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

Best regards,
Customer Service Team

prompt: Describe the steps to get user data: 1) Call GET /users/{id} 2) If user exists, call GET /users/{id}/preferences 3) Combine the data into a single response.
gold_answer:
Step 1: Make GET request to /users/{id} endpoint
Step 2: Check if response is successful and user exists
Step 3: If user exists, make GET request to /users/{id}/preferences
Step 4: Merge user data and preferences into combined response object
